meanings.definition: A system of tubes in insects and some other invertebrates that carries air to the body tissues.
meanings.sent1: The tracheae in insects help them breathe by carrying air to their body parts.
meanings.sent2: Insects rely on their tracheae to transport air throughout their bodies.
meanings.sent3: The tracheae in bugs are like tiny air highways inside their bodies.
meanings.sent4: The intricate network of tracheae in insects is nature's efficient air delivery system.
meanings.sent5: Imagine the tracheae in insects as tiny straws supplying oxygen to every cell.

meanings.definition: A similar system in some arachnids.
meanings.sent1: Certain arachnids have tracheae that help them breathe just like insects.
meanings.sent2: Spiders use their tracheae to circulate air within their bodies.
meanings.sent3: The tracheae in spiders are like secret tunnels for fresh air.
meanings.sent4: The tracheae of arachnids function like invisible air pipelines.
meanings.sent5: The tracheae in some spiders are like lifelines connecting them to the outside world.
